com.ibm.xasdi_bridge.message

Class MultiCastMessage

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ibm.xasdi_bridge.Message
      • com.ibm.xasdi_bridge.message.MultiCastMessage
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public abstract class MultiCastMessage
extends Message
    Message sent to several groups of agents. If you want to send message for all agents, use BroadCastMessage.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
